result.eng: The sun rose and the golden castles appeared not far from them.
result.ga: d'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibh
result.orig: d'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibh
result.html: d'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibhThe sun rose and the golden castles appeared not far from them.
result.ponchtml: d'éiriġ an ġrian agus noċt na caisleáin óir fá ġiota dóiḃThe sun rose and the golden castles appeared not far from them.

result.eng: Errigal appeared {emerged from behind the horizon}.
result.html: nocht an teargalErrigal appeared {emerged from behind the horizon}.
result.ponchtml: noċt an teargalErrigal appeared {emerged from behind the horizon}.
